related_post.text: > What i do:I downloaded go2go branch from github go rep as ZIParchive then i'm extract him and go to src and then i use cmd `all.bat`> What i have: I have this error and i don't understand what i need to do:`Building Go cmd/dist using c:\\go``go tool dist: FAILED: not a Git repo; must put a VERSION file in $GOROOT`P.S. I have the VERSION file in $GOROOTWhat i should do?
